animator.title: Java Item Model Animator
animator.author: Command master
animator.description: Takes two java item models and outputs a zip with a resourcepack and a datapack to make a clear transaction between them in the players hand (the plugin can also work for other animations but the datapack have to be coded manually).
animator.about:
The animation is activated using "/scoreboard players set @s animation 0".
To use click Filter -> Save starting model the save the first model, and then click on File -> Export -> Export animation to download the ZIP file of the animation

missing_texture_highlighter.title: Missing Texture Highlighter
missing_texture_highlighter.author: JannisX11
missing_texture_highlighter.description: Highlights missing textures by flashing them.

double_sided_cubes.title: Double Sided Cube Generator
double_sided_cubes.author: SnaveSutit
double_sided_cubes.description: Creates inverted duplicates of the selected cube(s) to allow double-sided rendering in java edition.

optimize.title: Optimize
optimize.author: Krozi
optimize.description: Hide concealed faces for better performance!

blockmodels-exporter.title: Export to BlockModels.com
blockmodels-exporter.author: TheDestruc7i0n
blockmodels-exporter.description: Export models from Blockbench directly to BlockModels.com

outline_creator.title: Outline Creator
outline_creator.author: Wither
outline_creator.description: Creates stylistic outlines for cubes using negative scale values.
outline_creator.about: To use the plugin, select an element you want to create an outline for, go to the Filter tab and click on the Create Outline option.

texture_editor.title: Texture Editor
texture_editor.author: JannisX11
texture_editor.description: Adds basic image manipulation functions - like contrast and saturation - to textures
texture_editor.about: To edit a texture, right click it and enter the Texture Editor menu. Select what you want to edit from the menu.

mod_utils.title: Mod Utils
mod_utils.author: JTK222 (Maintainer) & Wither (For the Techne importer)
mod_utils.description: Allows importing Tabula files, and exporting VoxelShapes

seat_position.title: Seat Position
seat_position.author: JannisX11
seat_position.description: Preview seat positions for custom Bedrock entities

resource_pack_exporter.title: Resource Pack Exporter
resource_pack_exporter.author: Wither
resource_pack_exporter.description: Exports your model as a ready-to-use Minecraft resource pack

ambient_occlusion.title: Ambient Occlusion
ambient_occlusion.author: JannisX11
ambient_occlusion.description: Adds a screen space ambient occlusion shader
ambient_occlusion.about: Ambient Occlusion is enabled by default. You can adjust the intensity or disable it in the settings.

guessing_game.title: The Guessing Game
guessing_game.author: JannisX11
guessing_game.description: Play the guessing game in Blockbench with your friends!

csmodel.title: CraftStudio Model Format
csmodel.author: JannisX11
csmodel.description: Allows to import and export CraftStudio Models (.csmodel).
csmodel.about:
To **import** a model from CraftStudio, go to the CraftStudio project settings and export a cspack file. Open this file in an archive manager (like 7zip) and extract the model file. Import the file into Blockbench using the import menu. 
To **export** a file, export a .csmodel file from Blockbench and drop it into an existing .cspack file into the Models folder. Make sure it is using the same file name as the old model in the pack. Import the .cspack into CraftStudio and select the models you want to import.

screencast_keys.title: Screencast Keys
screencast_keys.author: JannisX11
screencast_keys.description: Displays the key combinations you press on screen. Useful for tutorial videos.

discord-rpc.title: Discord RPC
discord-rpc.author: strajabot, Kastle, & simplyme
discord-rpc.description: Show a rich presence status in Discord.

cem_template_loader.title: CEM Template Loader
cem_template_loader.author: Ewan Howell
cem_template_loader.description: Load template entity models for use with OptiFine CEM.

threecore_exporter.title: ThreeCore Exporter
threecore_exporter.author: Lucraft, Spyeedy
threecore_exporter.description: Let's you export your models in the json entity model format for the ThreeCore mod!

startup_tips.title: Startup Tips
startup_tips.author: TheOtterlord
startup_tips.description: This plugin provides helpful tips for those unfamiliar with Blockbench
startup_tips.about: The Startup Tips plugin provides helpful tips about Blockbench on startup. These tips include tips about model creation, external resources, the editor, and more

animation_utils.title: GeckoLib Animation Utils
animation_utils.author: Eliot Lash, Gecko, McHorse
animation_utils.description: Create animated blocks, items, entity, and armor using the GeckoLib library and plugin. https://geckolib.com

modded_entity_fabric.title: Fabric Modded Entity
modded_entity_fabric.author: Eliot Lash
modded_entity_fabric.description: Plugin for exporting Modded Entities using Fabric/Yarn Sourcemap

multi-layer.title: Multi-Layer
multi-layer.author: aidancbrady
multi-layer.description: Allows exporting in Forge's multi-layer model format.

light_tracer_uploader.title: Light Tracer Uploader
light_tracer_uploader.author: JannisX11
light_tracer_uploader.description: Upload models to Light Tracer to share them or to create renders

code_view.title: Code View
code_view.author: wither
code_view.description: View the model you are currently editing in the raw format

only.title: Only
only.author: JannisX11
only.description: Hide everything except for the selected cubes

datagen_export.title: Datagen Export
datagen_export.author: itsmeow
datagen_export.description: Allows exporting to BlockStateProvider datagen code

duplicate_renamer.title: Duplicate Bone Renamer
duplicate_renamer.author: Gecko
duplicate_renamer.description: This plugin renames duplicate bones so they work in bedrock and GeckoLib models

texture_stitcher.title: Texture Stitcher
texture_stitcher.author: McHorse
texture_stitcher.description: Adds a menu item to textures editor that stitches multiple textures into one

arcaniax_block_exporter.title: Bedrock Block Exporter
arcaniax_block_exporter.author: Arcaniax
arcaniax_block_exporter.description: Helps making new Bedrock blocks (requires experimental mode)

bakery.title: Bakery
bakery.author: JannisX11
bakery.description: Bakes complex animations into simple linear keyframes

bedrock_pivot_fix.title: Bedrock Pivot Fix 2
bedrock_pivot_fix.author: JannisX11
bedrock_pivot_fix.description: Rotated cubes are broken in custom-block models in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. Use this plugin to fix them.
bedrock_pivot_fix.about: After installing, use **Filter > Fix Bedrock Pivots** to fix your current model.

simplify.title: Simplify Models
simplify.author: Ryan Garrett
simplify.description: Simplifies the cubes in a model. For example if a block was 0.99 pixels wide, then it would change it to 1.

java_animator.title: JavaAnimator
java_animator.author: Blocks_n_more
java_animator.description: A simple model animation tool for Minecraft: Java Edition
java_animator.about: When installed create your model and click the save state button, then once completed a few times export it and you'll get a ZIP with all the models.
